item.title: EP 122 - Thomas Dick And The 22 Trillion Alien Theory
item.itunes:title: Thomas Dick And The 22 Trillion Alien Theory
item.description:
A luckless bandit is napped because of a lack of Head and Shoulders, a cat who defied all odds, and then we look at the life of a Christian philosopher who tried to blend science and religion with hilarious results.

Patreon
https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!
https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

A thief committed the perfect crime in the 1980s. But with the advent of DNA technology, one man may wish he washed his hair more thoroughly.

Then we look at the journey of Kuzya. One cat, 1300 miles, a lifetime of adventure!

And finally, we meet Thomas Dick. He was a devout Christian who also believed in the power of science. He also believed the Solar System was full of aliens!

Links:

Dandruff DNA nets robber

https://www.standard.co.uk/news/dandruff-dna-nets-robber-6983963.html

15 Pets Who Returned Home From Remarkable Distances

https://www.brainz.org/15-pets-who-returned-home-remarkable-distances/

Thomas Dick

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thomas_Dick_(scientist)

Fantastically Wrong: The Scientist Who Thought 22 Trillion Aliens Live in Our Solar System

https://www.wired.com/2014/12/fantastically-wrong-thomas-dick/

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

"As Above" Art By Grant Scott

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"
